title: Unlocked Camera
body: I'm a level 30 player who still doesn't know how to use unlocked camera....(I know it's terrible). If anyone can give me a few pointers on how to get used to using unlocked camera that would be greatly appreciated ^_^.

replies.body:
I spent the first half of last year playing with a locked camera, I actually couldn't imagine playing without it being unlocked. Then I picked up Pantheon and kind of had to change the camera to unlock. I also had a few friends telling me it would be better for me to play with an unlocked camera. For a few months my camera control was awful (I'd lose sight of my champion regularly), but over time it did become easier. Practice is the key, now I always play with an unlocked camera :) 

You may find it useful decreasing the sensitivity of your mouse, this helped me. I also used to sometimes lock my camera for team fights. 

Best of luck
Spacebar baby. Look where you want then recenter with space bar.

You can hold the space bar to keep the camera on you. Just try using it without locked and if you ever need to lock on to your player, hold the space bar. I would also try doing bots first to feel more comfortable with it. It takes time for some, others it's quick. Took me a while but now I can't use locked camera without it feeling limited.

Thanks a ton! I will take your advice and go into bots with it 

^_^

This x10. I started playing League with a locked camera and then managed to shift off to free camera. Then, sometime over the past season, I think I shifted into just holding space bar to keep the camera on my champion but also having the freedom to move my camera around. Everyone has their own personal preference, though. I'd stick with holding space bar until you can naturally shift into keeping everything in a frame.
Try playing some mechanically easy champs like Garen while learning unlocked camera. Having to concentrate on mechanics less will make it easier to concentrate on camera control.
I get motion sickness with a locked camera.

I only started playing unlocked camera half a years ago. Being someone who started season 2 it was a REALLY hard transition for me.  So what you can do, is start off with the camera movement at 1/4 of the way, then progressively increase it as you get more and more used to the unlocked cam.

as others have said, space bar brings the camera on you, but the f keys f1-5 will put the camera on those players going left to right based on pick order. just something else for u to play around with. def play with bots first just to get a good feel of it
I always have F1 ready if I need to get my champ in center screen.
